''The X Factor'' is planning on changing the reality show singing game- they have also expanded the age pool to younger and older contestants- something executive producer Simon Cowell is looking forward to seeing. I like the idea that a 12-year-old on this show can compete with an older singer and a singing group, Simon Cowell said in a statement issued by FOX. ''I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million

, the largest in TV history. ''We're putting our money where our mouth is,'' he said of the prize, which will be in the form of a recording contract with Sony.
